title: Easeout Weekly #2
short: A weekly roundup of the latest web design & development news.
body:
![Tailwind in React](/images/uploads/tailwind-css-in-react.png) [Setting up Tailwind CSS in React](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2020/02/tailwindcss-react-project/) A great overview of Tailwind CSS & how to seamlessly connect it to your React projects. [Read it!](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2020/02/tailwindcss-react-project/) [➡️](https://neumorphism.io/#55b9f3)
![Shoptalk Browser Chat](/images/uploads/shoptalk-firefox-chrome.png) [Podcast: Firefox & Chrome](https://shoptalkshow.com/400/) Episode 400 of the ShopTalk show! This week Jen Simmons & Adam Argyle stop by to continue conversations about where browsers are at, and what's coming up for browsers - specifically Firefox & Chrome. [Listen up](https://shoptalkshow.com/400/) ➡️
![Magazine Layout](/images/uploads/grid-spans.png) [A magazine layout in 20 lines of CSS](https://css-tricks.com/responsive-grid-magazine-layout-in-just-20-lines-of-css/) A fully responsive grid magazine layout in just 20 lines of CSS! [See it](https://css-tricks.com/responsive-grid-magazine-layout-in-just-20-lines-of-css/)[ ➡️](https://css-tricks.com/the-hooks-of-react-router/)
![Diagonal Layouts](/images/uploads/diagonal-layout.png) [Diagonal Layouts in 2020](https://codepen.io/enbee81/full/yLyrmyg) A great visual presentation with tips for how to create pure CSS diagonal layouts. [See it ](https://codepen.io/enbee81/full/yLyrmyg)➡️
![CSS text lines](/images/uploads/line-weaving-through-text.png) [Weaving a line through text in CSS](https://css-tricks.com/weaving-a-line-through-text-in-css/) A nice explanation of how we can achieve this 3D effect. [See it](https://css-tricks.com/weaving-a-line-through-text-in-css/) ➡️
![Ethical Design Podcast](/images/uploads/ethical-design-podcast.png) [Ethical Design](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2020/02/smashing-podcast-episode-10/) What does it mean for a design to be ethical, and how do we make improvements in our own projects? In this podcast, Drew McLellan speaks to Trine Falbe and Martin Michael Frederiksen to find out. [Listen up! ](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2020/02/smashing-podcast-episode-10/)➡️
![Foldable web](/images/uploads/huawei-mate-x-samsung-galaxy-z-fold-foldable-web.png) [What does a foldable web actually mean?](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2020/02/foldable-web-meaning/) Foldable devices have brought with them talk of a ‘foldable web,’ and the idea that long-standing web conventions may be on the verge of a serious shakeup. Is it all hype, or is it time to get flexible? [Read it](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2020/02/foldable-web-meaning/) ➡️
![RGB vs HEX](/images/uploads/rgb-hex.png) [RGB vs HEX](https://codepen.io/pehaa/full/QWbvjyE) A wonderful visual demonstration of the effect of RGB and HEX values on color. [See it](https://codepen.io/pehaa/full/QWbvjyE) ➡️
![Animated Matryoshka Dolls in CSS](/images/uploads/bears-featured.png) [Animated Matryoshka Dolls in CSS](https://css-tricks.com/animated-matryoshka-dolls-in-css/) In this article, we'll see how to create a set of animated matryoshka dolls in pure CSS! [See it!](https://css-tricks.com/animated-matryoshka-dolls-in-css/) ➡️
![Instant GraphQL backend](/images/uploads/instant-graphql.png) [Instant GraphQL backend with FaunaDB](https://css-tricks.com/instant-graphql-backend-using-faunadb/) In this article, we will see how to create a scalable and fast GraphQL API with authentication and fine-grained data-access control (authorization). [Read it](https://css-tricks.com/instant-graphql-backend-using-faunadb/) ➡️
![SEO in design process](/images/uploads/seo-web-design-process.png) [Where does SEO belong in the design process?](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2020/02/seo-web-design-process/) This article argues that SEO should be a team sport, to be included throughout all phases of the design process. [Read it](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2020/02/seo-web-design-process/) ➡️
![WordPress theme development](/images/uploads/wordpress-stock.png) [Where to learn WordPress theme development?](https://css-tricks.com/where-to-learn-wordpress-theme-development/) A roundup of the ways to learn WordPress theme development, no matter what your skill level! [Read it](https://css-tricks.com/where-to-learn-wordpress-theme-development/) ➡️
